Thursday, January 6, 2005

Tracks: A Getting Things Done implementation

Posted by admin

Getting Things Done is all the rage these days as geeks scramble to inject some order into their messy work lives. So what better way to jump on board that train than to use Tracks — an implementation of the GTD pattern by but she’s a girl:

Checkout the rest of the screenshots and download Tracks 1.0.

Congratulations to BSAG for launching her first public Rails application!
